11.title: NEWS FROM THE EQUATOR
clues: (Kelly of the Clue Crew reports from the bridge of a ship.)  Here in the Galapagos, I'm at about 90 degrees west longitude, halfway between the Prime Meridian and International Date Line, and at this many degrees latitude
